content: When John, who was in prison, heard about Christ's deeds, he sent two of his disciples to ask him "Are you the one who is to come, or should we expect another?"
translations: ita:Quando Giovanni, che era in prigione, sentì parlare delle gesta di Cristo, mandò due dei suoi discepoli a chiedergli﹕ Se
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by patgfisher (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
